_header: I rede we all take heed / What Matthew witnesseth here in deed
_description: Gospel ‘Feria sexta post Pascha,’ in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
I Rede we alle take hedeWhat Matheu witnesseth here in
                    dede…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He bring vs to his Blisse a boueÞat soffred deþ for
                    Monnes loue. AMEN.

Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.

                poet.a.1,
